entities.description: Specific month in which the agency activity indicators are reported (e.g., May, June).
The indicators related to agency activity measured on a monthly basis.
The raw count of responses without any weighting applied.
Percentage of total responses for each indicator.
Total number of valid responses recorded for a given indicator.

relationships.description: Indicates the unweighted frequency of responses for a specific agency activity indicator.
Indicates the percentage of total responses for a specific agency activity indicator.
Reports the total number of valid responses for the agency activity indicators.
Relates the agency activity indicator to the month it was reported.
